_description: William Herebert’s version of the hymn ‘Christe redemptor omnium’ — seven quatrains

BLAdd46919.First Lines: Cryst buggere of alle ycoren þe uadres olpysoneOn to uoren ey gynnyng boren ouer alle speche and wone…
BLAdd46919.Last Lines: …Weole louerd beo wyth þe yboren of o mayWyth uader and þe holy gosy wiþouten endeday
BLAdd46919.Attributed Author: Herebert (written above the text where title usually goes, f. 208)
BLAdd46919.Attributed Title: Criste redemptor omny (in right margin beside first line, where Latin tags occur for stanzas below, f. 208)
BLAdd46919.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XIV Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1924. 2nd ed., rev.: G. V. Smithers, Oxford,
            1952: 23-4.
Luria,  Maxwell Sidney,  and  Richard L. Hoffman, eds.  
             Middle English Lyrics.
         New York: Norton, 1974: 95-6.
